data.name: Leage of Glory
data.details: LOG (League of Glory) is an android app of sportics event "LOG" specially designed for FASTIANS. One of the main feature of the app is Fantasy League of Glory where you can make your own team and on the basis of that you get the points just like the FANTASY Premier Leagues

data.name: Helmet Finder
data.details: Helmet Finder is an android app which is connect with Helmet's raspberry pi for finding driver's exact location and call driver if its reach at the desire location.

data.name: News Wizard
data.details: News wizard is a google news stand clone for visually impared people. Braille language is used to communicate.

data.name: Go Nets
data.details: Go Nets is an android app which helps cricket lovers to find net session near by their places. Each can host net practise session also

data.name: Teacher Studio
data.details: Teacher Studio is an android app for teachers to maintain class activities and work and can check class assignment
